name: Rainbow Run (itch) (Nefisto, Ondon, MahatK)
description:
Score space jam 01/2021, the theme was - Teleportation - so we came with an idea to play pong/volleyball with two pads and teleport from one side to another, in the end we inserted an unicorn and a lot of love <3

PSA:  If u get bugged after use the cheat button, press P two times, K button is locking inputs and P will pause, so two times P will unpause and unlock
